main.name: I'm Dino Marchiori.
main.description: A Full Stack developer, always hungry for knowledge!
main.bio: I'm a developer that comes from a business and finance background. Through my past experiences, I can balance the need of users and businesses to understand their pain points and contribute as a developer to solve their issues. I've worked with a wide range of people from different backgrounds and demographics. This has enabled me to adapt and become flexible in the workplace.
main.contactmessage: Let's chat! Fill up the form below to send me a message. I'd love hearing from you.

projects.title: Event Hero
projects.category: Award winning Full Stack app (MERN). Got 96% of the votes competing against 18 other great projects. The app is an online event wallet that can be used to make orders in concerts, festivals and other events. Complete application with 4 user roles (customer, staff, event admin and app admin).

projects.title: Trip Planner
projects.category: As one of my projects at Ironhack's bootcamp I created an app to help users to plan ahead their trips and add activities to each day of the trip. The map will help the user check his daily route and see if its doable on that date or if he should rearrange his activities among the other days. The app uses google maps API and cloudinary API to handle the images.

projects.title: Movie Browser App
projects.category: This app was developed using ReactJS, ReactHooks and Bootstrap. The API is providaded by TMDB and the app uses fetch to get the API info.

projects.title: Coatings Company Website
projects.category: Institutional website coded using Wordpress with custom order submission page for its nationwide sales team. Unfortunately the code of this project belongs to a private company and for that reason I can't disclose it

projects.title: Pokemon Canvas Game
projects.category: This project was developed during my time at Ironhack's Bootcamp. You can choose from 4 different pokemons to start the game and as you keep defeating your opponents, your pokemon evolves improving its attack and defense levels. Be careful to not be defeated by the other pokemons, because they do strike back.
